data.title: Metro Rail News Dec 2022 Issue
data.meta_description: This issue covers "Non-Motorized Transportation - Shifting Focus to Last Mile Connectivity through NMT" in the cover story. The "Ahmedabad Metro" i...
data.text: This issue covers "Non-Motorized Transportation - Shifting Focus to Last Mile Connectivity through NMT" in the cover story. The "Ahmedabad Metro" is featured as the Project of the Month and focuses on its expansion and increasing city connectivity. The "Kanpur Metro" is covered as the featured project in this issue. Exclusive interviews of Mr. Rodrigo Fernandes - Director, ES(D)G - Empowering Sustainable Development Goals, Bentley Systems, Mr. Steve Cockerell - Industry Marketing Director- Transportation, Bentley Systems & Mr. Ian Rosam - Director, Product Management, Bentley Systems from the Bentley Systemâ€™s Year in Infrastructure Awards 2022, London adorn this issue. Alon with these, our regular columns like news highlights, featured articles, event calendar, articles, and tender live will provide you with the latest updates from the industry.
